mitigation_strategies.action: Reduce overall position sizes - current 1-day VaR: 6.6%
Implement portfolio-level hedging (index shorts, volatility longs)

methodology_summary.summary: Audited account risk (drawdown, VaR, concentration) before prescribing guardrails and alerts.
calculation_steps: Aggregate current exposures, leverage and collateral usage across accounts.
Stress recent volatility regimes to measure Value-at-Risk and tail losses.
Propose stop-loss, position limits and diversification improvements tailored to findings.
methodology_summary.calculation_notes: Risk metrics mix historical and parametric models; low-liquidity assets require manual review.

regulatory_disclosures.risk_warning: Crypto assets are highly volatile and can result in substantial or total losses. Outputs are informational only and do not constitute investment advice.
regulatory_disclosures.jurisdiction_notice: Confirm digital asset trading is permitted in your jurisdiction and comply with all suitability requirements. Consult a licensed advisor for personalised guidance.
regulatory_disclosures.rebalancing_notice: Portfolio targets assume timely rebalancing and access to sufficient liquidity. Deviations can materially impact performance.
regulatory_disclosures.simulation_notice: Results generated in simulation mode. Live execution, fees and slippage can materially differ from simulated outcomes.

educational_resources.title: Why spreading capital matters
educational_resources.summary: Holding uncorrelated assets reduces reliance on a single performer and helps dampen portfolio volatility.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Blend layer-1s, DeFi, infrastructure tokens and stablecoins to improve risk-adjusted returns.

educational_resources.title: Prepare for large swings
educational_resources.summary: Daily double-digit moves are common. Position sizing, stop-losses and disciplined risk budgets are critical safeguards.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Stress test positions assuming 30–80% annualised volatility and plan for gap risk.

educational_resources.title: Different roles in a portfolio
educational_resources.summary: Stablecoins provide liquidity and downside buffers, while alt-coins target growth but contribute most drawdown risk.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Maintain a stablecoin reserve to cover margin calls and fund opportunistic entries without forced selling.

educational_resources.title: Use borrowed capital cautiously
educational_resources.summary: Leverage accelerates losses during volatility spikes. Liquidations can happen quickly when collateral buffers are thin.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Limit leverage to clearly defined setups, monitor funding costs and avoid stacking multiple leveraged trades.

educational_resources.title: Keep allocations aligned
educational_resources.summary: Periodic rebalancing locks in gains and reins in concentration. Ignoring drifts can magnify downside during shocks.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Review weights monthly or when allocations move >5% away from targets to maintain intended risk levels.

stop_loss_rules.volume_stop: Exit if volume drops 50% from entry

methodology_summary.summary: Ran systematic models for AI Scalping Engine on BTC/USDT combining statistical filters and risk overlays.
calculation_steps: Load multi-factor indicators (momentum, mean reversion, volume) and normalise them.
Blend signals using the configured strategy archetype to derive directional conviction.
Apply Kelly-inspired sizing with volatility caps to produce executable orders.
methodology_summary.calculation_notes: Model confidence reflects ensemble agreement and sample depth; allocations are clipped to portfolio risk limits.

methodology_summary.summary: Evaluated derivatives order books, funding data and volatility to structure AI Funding Arbitrage on BTC/USDT with a balanced risk posture.
calculation_steps: Pull live funding, basis and volatility metrics for the contract and underlying asset.
Translate risk mode into position sizing, leverage ceilings and margin buffers.
Assemble trade instructions and hedges before validating exchange-specific constraints.
methodology_summary.calculation_notes: Derivatives sizing links to margin requirements; leverage and funding costs were stress tested before recommending trades.

methodology_summary.summary: Built hedge ratios for the provided portfolio basket using correlation and beta estimates.
calculation_steps: Estimate factor exposures and betas for instruments needing protection.
Select hedge assets with liquidity and opposite correlation signatures.
Size hedges to neutralise targeted risk while respecting capital constraints.
methodology_summary.calculation_notes: Hedge effectiveness depends on correlation stability; positions are monitored for basis drift.

educational_resources.title: Different roles in a portfolio
educational_resources.summary: Stablecoins provide liquidity and downside buffers, while alt-coins target growth but contribute most drawdown risk.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Maintain a stablecoin reserve to cover margin calls and fund opportunistic entries without forced selling.

educational_resources.title: Use borrowed capital cautiously
educational_resources.summary: Leverage accelerates losses during volatility spikes. Liquidations can happen quickly when collateral buffers are thin.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Limit leverage to clearly defined setups, monitor funding costs and avoid stacking multiple leveraged trades.

educational_resources.title: Track collateral health
educational_resources.summary: Margin ratios determine liquidation risk. Monitoring maintenance levels across exchanges prevents forced unwinds.
educational_resources.actionable_tip: Set alerts for margin utilisation >70% and keep extra collateral ready to top up positions.
